Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends provisions of law authorizing the county of Cortland to impose an additional mortgage recording tax
Summary: Extends provisions of law authorizing the county of Cortland to impose an additional mortgage recording tax until December 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 443 of the laws of 2007 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Cortland to impose an additional mortgage recording tax, in relation to extending the effectiveness of such provisions
